paragraph:
19 cassettes so far. But of course there are tracks that would not fit the demos at the time. For different reasons. Sometimes the track was a bit too soft. Sometimes too hard. Sometimes the quality was not good enough. Or no demo was scheduled.
That is the reason why 26 more tracks have been added to this already huge collection of songs. Spanning from the very first beginning with the very first track from the duo: ”Orientalisk böldpest” to the 2013 remaster of Impulzus - made for a Youtube clip.
